title: Full Prototyping Services
content: We offer a complete prototyping service for SMT, enclosures, and packaging to bring your initial concept to a tangible, testable product.

title: In-House SMT Assembly
content: Our state-of-the-art facilities provide high-quality Surface-Mount Technology (SMT) assembly for your PCBs, ensuring precision and rapid turnarounds.

image_alt: A custom metal enclosure for electronics.
title: Metal Enclosures
content: We specialize in laser cutting for sheet metal, custom aluminum profiles, and high-pressure die casting to create durable and beautiful enclosures.

image_alt: Plastic injection molding machine in operation.
title: Plastic Injection Molding
content: Leverage our expertise in plastic injection molding for both small, intricate components and large, robust housing parts for your electronics.

image_alt: Customized electronic components with unique finishes.
title: Customization Services
content: From custom finishes and printing to unique packaging solutions, we help you tailor every detail to match your brand's unique identity.
